title: Fieldy's Dreams
description:
Fieldy's Dreams Released 2002 Ripped by Winamp@320k

Fieldy's Dreams lives up to its name. Korn bassist Fieldy felt as though his contributions to his band did not incorporate his love of rap enough. So during a down period between albums, he literally made a rap record despite having no previous experience in the genre besides listening to it. Programming most of the beats himself and enlisting producer Polar Bear to help with the rest, Fieldy's Dreams' first album was released in January of 2002. 

1. Cocky  
2. Baby Hugh Hef  
3. Rock n Roll Gangster  
4. Are You Talkin To Me  
5. Just For Now (w/ Jonathan Davis)  
6. You Saved Me (From Being Crazy)  
7. Munky Rage  
8. Put a Week On It  
9. Child Vigilante  
10. Korn Gigglebox  
11. Sugar-Coated  
12. Comin From a Friend  
13. One Love  
14. Ortiz Anthem  
15. Special K Buzz  
16. Bleu  
17. Do What You Feel
